get.summary: Get a list of sessions by event and partnership
get.description:
The Partnership Id serves as a filter. When a valid Partnership Id is provided, the resulting list of sessions will be narrowed down. 
However, if an invalid Partnership Id is provided, the filter won’t be applied, and all sessions for the given EventId will be returned.

404.description: Sessions not found by the Event and partnership informed. Or event not found by the given EventId.
